work.summary: My role on this team is to develop end-to-end solutions for the business. Solutions are primarily built upon our social enterprise solutions. We develop not only the company intranet but also the extranet. This allows Hyland employees, resellers and customers to interact and communicate in new ways.
highlights: Designed, implemented and supported an enterprise class web application to facilitate the transfer of knowledge and encourage communication between employees, partners and customers.
Access to support issues, manage sales opportunities and provide online licensing of software applications
Created a new company intranet and extranet that allowed for increased communication and shared insights between our employees, reseller channels and customer base.
Built many end-to-end custom solutions on top of our intranet and extranet to facilitate business processes.
Aided in implementing and adhering to an agile software methodology
Implemented and trained my team on distributed version control using Git and modern build and deployment practices that facilitated a continuous deployment strategy.

work.summary: I began Testa Software in the summer of 2009 as a one-man consulting shop. Contact me if you have any interest in contracting my services for any custom development.

While at Micro-Office Systems I worked as a mid-level developer in the healthcare space. I worked on a wide range of software products including HL7 systems integrations, communications utilities, custom back-office Scantron OMR applications and ANSI 835/837 billing utilities. I assumed multiple responsibilities as a both a developer and as a technical support contact. Software was developed using C#/.NET, Perl and C++ across several different platforms include Microsoft Windows, Linux, and SCO Unix. Other responsibilities included document composition and internal product testing.
highlights: OS: Windows, SCO Unix, and Linux

work.summary: While in school I worked at a consultant for Sky Internet Solutions. My focus was on both back-end and front-end web site development using C#/.NET, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
highlights: Tech Stack: ASP.Net, C#, HTML, XHTML and CSS

volunteer.summary: A local Cleveland .NET Enterprise User Group.

certifications.name: Improving Deep Neural Networks: Hyperparameter tuning, Regularization and Optimization
Microsoft® Certified Technology Specialist: .NET Framework 4, Web Applications
